page.title: 14SANDWICK - INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: {Parkend Indutrial Estate.}Has seven industries based there. {Mackenzie's Builders Yard}wich makes blocks and precast concrete also sells other building materials. They employ 30 men. {Malcom Macloeds and Co}have a builders yard and a D.I.Y shop {Smith's Lemonade Factory}make and bottle their own lemonade. {Gaelpak}is a factory making sausage rolls, scotch pies, dumplings and eve's puddings. {Murray's Welding}shop employs 4 men. {Lewis Offshore}have a training shop for welders. {D.M Campbell}has a road haulage distribution centre.
